item.title: Helping people with their questions come ask them here
item.dc:creator: @OnYx OnYx
item.description:
@OnYx wrote:

Pariah:

Compile? How do you run a compile?

Go to your file with all your client.java (dont go into client.java though!) and all that stuff u should see an icon (that is different from the rest) and it should be called compile. Click it…

Death God:

what is hamachi

Hamachi is a program that lets you run private servers in your computer. The only thing difference it has from “no-ip” is people have to “sign in” to the server using hamachi. Hamachi lets you log on to the better servers like anotherscape and so on.

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.source: Helping people with their questions come ask them here

item.title: Helping people with their questions come ask them here
item.dc:creator: @Pariah Pariah
item.description:
@Pariah wrote:

alright, open up your source go to compile and delete everything in there

add this

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injava.exe” server
pause

where it says YOURSERVERNAME put ur servername do not add Example: no-ip.info

Alright now there is a error code saying The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect

Any other suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Helping people with their questions come ask them here
item.dc:creator: @Pariah Pariah
item.description:
@Pariah wrote:

Ok I have set up a server using No-ip.com and I have jdk 5.0 and I have edited the codes but when i go to load the .bat file I get an error saying [code]error: cannot read: *.java 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server[/code]
\

I am still getting that error message. I have tried many other things. What else should I try?

Read full topic
